label: 太政官
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: Stood above the Eight Bureaus as the highest organ of government.  Its members were the three Ministers (Left, Right, and Palace); the Counsellors (Counsellor, Grand Counsellor); and the Consultants.  The executive office of the Council of State employed Junior Counsellors and Controllers, among other lesser officials. [RK]
